name: Robot Tank Battle
description:
The game controls the robot or tank to attack enemies, search for oil tanks to replenish the tank when the health bar on the vehicle is low, shoot and destroy the blocks seen on the way to make more vehicles appear. tanks follow in combat support. Destroy all the enemies around the flagpole and enter to complete the level and move on to the next level.
Control easily with the movement keys W, S, A, D, rotate the tank turret and attack enemies with the arrow keys, change the camera perspective with the C key, leave the tank and fight with robot with the E key, control the robot to find any abandoned tanks to occupy and control.
